scripts.build: npm run build:apps && npm run build:TuZonaSegura
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:appaportante && npm run build:apppensionista && npm run build:appempleador && npm run build:appsctr
scripts.build:appaportante: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project appaportante --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/appaportante && node projects/appaportante/mergelib.js
scripts.build:apppensionista: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project apppensionista --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/apppensionista && node projects/apppensionista/mergelib.js
scripts.build:appempleador: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project appempleador --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/appempleador && node projects/appempleador/mergelib.js
scripts.build:appsctr: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project appsctr --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/appsctr && node projects/appsctr/mergelib.js
scripts.build:apppensionistadist: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project apppensionista --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/apppensionista && node projects/apppensionista/mergelib.js && node copy-bundles.js
scripts.build:appaportantedist: ng build --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --configuration production --single-bundle --project appaportante --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false --output-path src/assets/micro-frontends/appaportante && node projects/appaportante/mergelib.js && node copy-bundles.js
scripts.npx-build-plus:copy-assets: node projects/appaportante/copy-bundles.js && node projects/apppensionista/copy-bundles.js && node projects/appempleador/copy-bundles.js && node projects/appsctr/copy-bundles.js
